name: In the Eyes of the Dragon
name_original: In the Eyes of the Dragon
description: You  play as a greedy dragon trying to escape his collapsing lair and salvage as much gold as  he can.  Also there is a leaderboard for the top scores!  Use W/A/D  (or the arrow keys) to move. The more speed boosts you get the less bonus you get at the end. Therefor "Less is More".  Made using Unity, Krita,  Visual Studio, SFXR, and BeepBox. Please report bugs by commenting  below!
